input.sentences: my sister had a small new year 's eve party .
the cat seemed to be too tired to celebrate | but we gave him a hat anyway .
i had n't seen my sister in a while | so it was good to catch up .
her husband was there | getting a little too drunk as usual .
my sister provided tons of yummy snacks for us to munch on . happy new year !
output.sentences: David's sister was especially silly at our New Years Eve party last year.
To celebrate, when she grew tired of the hat and placed it on our cat.
As usual, his funny sister was waiting to catch the punch line of my joke.
Also as usual, my husband is quite amusing when he's drunk.
Tons of yummy snacks, and good people to share them, made this evening a fond memory.
